p: The alkaloids, glycosides and carotenoids compositions of the leaves and stems of Pandiaka heudelotii is presented in Table 6a. The leaves (3309.6 mg/kg dry weight) and stems (2407.6 mg/kg dw) had very high total alkaloidsâ€™ contents. Nine known alkaloids were detected including triacetonamine (60.13% in leaves; 57.20% in stems), acalyphin (23.90% in leaves; 24.26% in stems) and quinine (15.97% in leaves; 18.54% in stems). 3-Methoxytyramine, lycorine, aporphine, thiarubrine A, gelanthamine and dopamine constituted less than 0.001%.
